rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
FDA 加强人工智能监管，确保患者安全和医疗保健创新FDA 正在调整法规来管理人工智能在医疗保健领域的快速发展，重点关注患者安全和人工智能工具的生命周期。本次审查强调需要持续监测，以确保人工智能在临床环境中有效发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/FDA-strengthens-AI-regulation-to-ensure-patent-safety-and-innovation-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/FDA-strengthens-AI-regulation-to-ensure-patent-safety-and-innovation-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6019fb4d-d1e1-4970-8a04-620342230a8d Wed, 16 Oct 2024 23:46:00 -0400 FDA strengthens AI regulation to ensure patient safety and innovation in healthcare
扩大 GLP-1 减肥药物的使用范围可以挽救数千人的生命研究人员估计，扩大减肥药物的使用范围每年可以挽救超过 50,000 人的生命，降低肥胖率并解决健康不平等问题。目前的药物摄入水平可以大大减少死亡人数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Expanding-access-to-GLP-1-weight-loss-drugs-could-save-thousands-of-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Expanding-access-to-GLP-1-weight-loss-drugs-could-save-thousands-of-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a4b4bb5-4b0a-49a0-80e2-5b4b441e4761 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 23:10:00 -0400 Expanding access to GLP-1 weight-loss drugs could save thousands of lives
明亮的夜光暴露会增加死亡风险，而日光则会降低死亡风险研究表明，更明亮的夜间光线照射和昼夜节律紊乱会显着增加死亡风险，特别是心脏代谢疾病的死亡风险，而更明亮的白天光线会降低这些风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Bright-night-light-exposure-increases-mortality-risk-while-daylight-reduces-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Bright-night-light-exposure-increases-mortality-risk-while-daylight-reduces-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=194920fc-4d79-4850-be49-3b8fb5daaf98 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 22:35:00 -0400 Bright night light exposure increases mortality risk, while daylight reduces it
电子推动提高了非糖尿病患者的流感疫苗接种率，但未能提高糖尿病患者的接种率电子推动对非糖尿病患者的流感疫苗接种影响较小，但对糖尿病患者没有显着影响，这表明需要针对该群体制定量身定制的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Electronic-nudges-improve-flu-vaccination-rates-in-non-diabetic-病人-but-fail-to-increase-uptake-in-diabetics。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Electronic-nudges-improve-flu-vaccination-rates-in-non-diabetic-病人-but-fail-to-increase-uptake-in-diabetics。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64e9cd26-cc84-438b-a156-4b1ba05d5889 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 22:09:00 -0400 Electronic nudges improve flu vaccination rates in non-diabetic patients but fail to increase uptake in diabetics
微塑料加速脂肪组织的衰老和炎症，增加慢性病的风险研究人员研究了微塑料暴露对脂肪组织正常衰老和功能的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Micro Plastics-accelerate-aging-and-inflammation-in-fat-tissue-increasing-risk-of-chronic-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Micro Plastics-accelerate-aging-and-inflammation-in-fat-tissue-increasing-risk-of-chronic-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=127fdb06-a54a-41a6-b710-817bd2d2ffc6 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 21:37:00 -0400 Microplastics accelerate aging and inflammation in fat tissue, increasing risk of chronic disease
新蛋白质显示出治疗收缩性心力衰竭的潜力心脏是一块与众不同的肌肉，昼夜不停地平均每分钟跳动 60 至 100 次。但当它变得虚弱时，可能会导致严重的问题：从令人衰弱的呼吸短促、腿脚肿胀到肺部积液，甚至死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New- Protein-shows-pottial-for-treating-systolic-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New- Protein-shows-pottial-for-treating-systolic-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05deb56c-8254-483f-8761-83cefc5f023a Wed, 16 Oct 2024 21:12:00 -0400 New protein shows potential for treating systolic heart failure
突破性的抗菌绷带可在事故中快速止血如果没有适当的医疗发明，交通碰撞、严重工作场所事故或武器造成的伤害可能会导致致命的失血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Groundwriting-antimicrobial-bandage-offers-rapid-hemostasis-in-accidents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Groundwriting-antimicrobial-bandage-offers-rapid-hemostasis-in-accidents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b23e346-45e0-4db8-a033-39e640f66fd1 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 21:00:48 -0400 Groundbreaking antimicrobial bandage offers rapid hemostasis in accidents
FDA 批准的乳腺癌药物显示出治疗阑尾癌的希望加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院的研究人员发现，FDA 批准的一种用于治疗乳腺癌的药物有可能成为治疗特定类型阑尾癌的有效疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/FDA-approved-breast-cancer-drug-shows-promise-for-appendix-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/FDA-approved-breast-cancer-drug-shows-promise-for-appendix-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2e0cf0d-977b-4a0f-8c68-3b19ca41e5b8 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 20:55:00 -0400 FDA-approved breast cancer drug shows promise for appendix cancer
创新的纳米颗粒疗法为对抗前列腺癌带来了希望前列腺癌是美国男性癌症死亡的第二大原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Innovative-nanoarticle-therapy-offers-hope-in​​-fighting-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Innovative-nanoarticle-therapy-offers-hope-in​​-fighting-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bee9986a-1abb-467e-8447-66d3cbe22038 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 20:50:21 -0400 Innovative nanoparticle therapy offers hope in fighting prostate cancer
免疫疗法为霍奇金淋巴瘤治疗设定新标准一种集结免疫系统来消灭癌症​​的治疗方法将晚期霍奇金淋巴瘤患者的生存率提高到了惊人的 92%，这为该疾病提供了一种新的标准疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Immunotherapy-sets-new-standard-for-Hodgkin-lymphoma-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Immunotherapy-sets-new-standard-for-Hodgkin-lymphoma-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=533378bd-bed8-4cd5-8cc0-e6ea0e56258c Wed, 16 Oct 2024 20:47:00 -0400 Immunotherapy sets new standard for Hodgkin lymphoma care
